songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
One, two, three, four

[Chorus]
If you hit the ground hard enough, you'll bounce back up
Try not to worry
If it's cold, let it snow, you never know
It might just be a flurry
Right around the corner lies springtime
With it comes the power of the sunshine to melt it all away (Ooh-ooh-ooh)
Melt it all away (Ooh-ooh-ooh)
Melt it all away (Ooh-ooh-ooh)
Melt it all away (Ooh-ooh-ooh)

[Verse]
I used to always have to put on my tap shoes
I used to be used to givin' bad news
Used to have a refrigerator full of Band-Aids
My own house back porch like a damn cage
'Til now I had a dark cloud hovering
Never thought about just outrunnin' it
Now every single day got sun in it
And everything I do got love in it

[Chorus]
If you hit the ground hard enough, you'll bounce back up
Try not to worry
If it's cold, let it snow, you never know
It might just be a flurry
Right around the corner lies springtime
With it comes the power of the sunshine to melt it all away (Ooh-ooh-ooh)
Melt it all away (Ooh-ooh-ooh)
Melt it all away (Ooh-ooh-ooh)
Melt it all away (Ooh-ooh-ooh)
songs.title: Flurry
